title: Atomic scale simulation in the service of nuclear materials

author: Robin W. Grimes, Department of Materials, Imperial College London

segmentation: Today's speaker is professor Robin Grimes.
He worked as a research fellow at the University of Kiel from 85 to 89.
Then he was a research fellow at the Royal Institution of Great Britain from 89 until 90 and then from 19 until 94.
He was assistant Director of David Paradigm Research Lab.
Since 1995 he is at the materials Department at Imperial College.
Since 2002 he is a professor of material physics at Imperial College.
In 2000 he was a birthday Mathias Scholar at Los Alamos National Labs and currently is also director of Center for Nuclear Engineering and Imperial College, and also a director.
The director of Rolls Royce University Technology Center for nuclear Engineering.
